类 FSHDFSUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.CommonFSUtils

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class FSHDFSUtils
extends FSUtils
    Implementation for hdfs

        desFs -
        返回:

                             CancelableProgressable reporter)
                      throws IOException
        Recover the lease from HDFS, retrying multiple times.
        指定者:
        recoverFileLease 在类中 FSUtils
        参数:
        fs - FileSystem handle
        p - Path of file to recover lease
        conf - Configuration handle
        抛出:
        IOException

        boolean recoverLease(org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DistributedFileSystem dfs,
                     int nbAttempt,
                     org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path p,
                     long startWaiting)
              throws FileNotFoundException
        Try to recover the lease.
        参数:
        dfs -
        nbAttempt -
        p -
        startWaiting -
        返回:
        True if dfs#recoverLease came by true.
        抛出:
        FileNotFoundException
